original_text: And the Amorites forced the children of Dan into the mountain: for they would not suffer them to come down to the valley:
korean_text: 아모리 족속이 단 자손을 산지로 몰아넣고 골짜기에 내려오기를 용납하지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: And the Amorites forced the children of Dan
sentences.korean_translation: 아모리 사람들은 단 지파를 강제로 몰아냈고

sentences.original_text: for they would not suffer them
to come down to the valley:
